title: LF Clash Players Tier II
body:
As I've had no luck finding a team I'm looking for 4 other players looking to join a team for clash. First in first serve but I'm looking for people who can play both days preferably. 

Must;
Have a Mic. (If you have a discord we can use even better)
Confirm the role you would like with me in client.


ADD me on client with the code word "Pancake", I'll know what you're talking about (It will be our secret).

Team name is [BOP] Boppers 


Your friendly rift chum, 
Pixar

replies.body:
I'm still looking for a Top, JG and Mid who can confirm their roles with me. 

It is my first time playing clash and wouldn't mind playing as a 5 beforehand in a flex match or two.
I am a silver 1/gold midlaner looking for a team!

I have a team of 4 looking for a support. Message me on discord for more info. 
Discord: nimajneB#1691
